thread.section_title: Beddingstyle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beddingstyle | www.beddingstyle.com
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text:
I ordered a Laura Ashley comforter set and decorative pillows (Sophia).
It was delivered quickly and packed great. It was actually prettier than the picture on-line. Unfortunately, I ordered the twin size for my twin bed, but it was much too small, it only came to the top of my mattress, length was okay though. I have to return it (only because of the size, the quality was great).
